nodes.text: The Lost Hope was an old, barely-functioning freighter with two sublight engines.

The freighter design was based on the Trade Federation Lucrehulk-class LH-3210 cargo freighter, but was much smaller.
The freighter itself was so rusty and degraded by 25 ABY, it had large, red spots covering its hull.
In 25 ABY, it was used to ferry a New Republic crew on the Best Chance from the Ralroost to Garqi prior to the battle which took place there.
